title: Member Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at IBEW Local 46 (Seattle, WA) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: The organizers at IBEW Local 46 were very helpful when I was deciding to organize into the IBEW union. Although I came in on my own and was ready to join without any persuasion, I could tell that someone who was still on the fence about joining wouldn't feel like they were being pushed into anything.  I recommend it for anyone interested!
Interview Questions: They asked about past experience, duration of employment and areas worked in.
